review: So impressed.  I'm not missing my Apple TV at all on our TV in our home gym area.  We got the fire stick mainly because the TV is wall mounted and we didn't want to also have to mount a bunch of externals and deal with wires.  It's perfect.  Works great.
author: SHELLY K ALIOA
